Package com.guinetik.hexafun.examples.counter

Class CounterValidators

java.lang.Object
com.guinetik.hexafun.examples.counter.CounterValidators
public final class CounterValidators extends Object
Validation functions for counter operations.

Each validator is a pure function: Input -> Result<Input> Can be composed/chained in the DSL.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Result<CounterInputs.AddInput>
    validateAddAmount(CounterInputs.AddInput input)
    Validates that the amount in AddInput is within bounds [-100, 100].
    static Result<CounterInputs.AddInput>
    validateAddCounter(CounterInputs.AddInput input)
    Validates that the counter in AddInput is not null.

    Validates that the counter in DecrementInput is not null.
